Description: Seven fragments (five now joined together) of the body of a large red-brown pottery vessel (ostracon) with slightly convex sides, the interior is marked in places with a traces of a brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of a number of lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393497) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393497)
